ly15_qz18.mini.model

Class ChatRoomModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly15_qz18.mini.model.ChatRoomModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LobbyModel

    public class ChatRoomModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The chat room model in the chat room mini MVC.

        chatRoom - - the chat room object for this chat room model.
        dictionary - - mixed data dictionary.
        crModel2MainModelAdapter - - the chat room model to main model adapter.
        crModel2CRViewAdapter - - the chat room model to chat room view adapter.
        crCmd2ModelCustomAdapter - - the customized chat room command to model adapter.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        start the chat room model

      • exitChatRoom

        public void exitChatRoom()
        User exit this chat room, doing: Send message to the chat room to tell remote receivers the quit information. Send remove receiver data packet to all other receivers in the chat room to remove the receiver. Tell the main model to remove the chat room in user and to remove the chat room mini MVC.

      • addIReceiverToAll

        public boolean addIReceiverToAll(IReceiver receiverStub)
        Add a receiver to this chat room. The implementation should inform others in the chat room and then add the receiver in the local chat room by calling addIReceiverStub .
        Parameters:
        receiverStub - the receiver to add
        Returns:
        False if the receiver is already in the chat room; True if successfully add the receiver

      • removeIReceiverToAll

        public boolean removeIReceiverToAll(IReceiver receiverStub)
        Remove a receiver from this chat room. The implementation should remove the receiver in the local chat room, unexport from RMI server, and inform others in the chat room.
        Parameters:
        receiverStub - the receiver to remove
        Returns:
        False if the receiver is actually not in the chat room; True if successfully remove the receiver

      • removeReceiver

        public void removeReceiver(IReceiver receiverStub)
        Remove a receiverStub from this chat room locally.
        Parameters:
        receiverStub - is the receiverStub to remove from this chat room.

      • addReceiver

        public void addReceiver(IReceiver receiverStub)
        Add a receiverStub to this chat room locally.
        Parameters:
        receiverStub - is the receiverStub to add to this chat room.

      • put

        public <T> T put(MixedDataKey<T> key,
                 T value)
        Put a value into the local data storage(IMixedDataDictionary), associated with the given key, replacing any value already in the dictionary that is already associated with the key. Note that the local data storage(IMixedDataDictionary) is designed to be per-application.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of data being put in
        Parameters:
        key - the key to use to find the value
        value - The value to associate with the key
        Returns:
        The previous value associated with the key or null if there was none.

      • get

        public <T> T get(MixedDataKey<T> key)
        Get the value associated with the given key from the local data storage(IMixedDataDictionary) Note that the local data storage(IMixedDataDictionary) is designed to be per-application.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of data being retrieved
        Parameters:
        key - the key to use
        Returns:
        The value associated with the key or null if there is no entry for the key.

                                                      T data)
        Send a data packet to the chat room corresponding with the receiver
        Parameters:
        id - the class id, i.e. message type
        data - the data
